name: nestjs-microservices
description: NestJS Microservices Architecture with TCP Transport
author: Microservices Team

scripts.build:all: npm run build:identity && npm run build:ecommerce && npm run build:booking && npm run build:payment && npm run build:content && npm run build:admin && npm run build:gateway
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:identity" "npm run start:ecommerce" "npm run start:booking" "npm run start:payment" "npm run start:content" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:identity" "npm run dev:ecommerce" "npm run dev:booking" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:content" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/identity-service && npm install && cd ../e-commerce-service && npm install && cd ../booking-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../content-service && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install && cd ../../api-gateway && npm install
